name: offchainer
description: A system for trustless data exchange between Smart Contract and RDBMS.

scripts.staging: cd docker/environments/staging && docker-compose up -d && docker-compose logs -f middleware; docker-compose stop
scripts.development: cd docker/environments/development && docker-compose up; docker-compose stop
scripts.benchmarking: cd docker/environments/benchmarking && docker-compose up -d && docker-compose logs -f middleware; docker-compose stop
scripts.testing: cd docker/environments/testing && docker-compose up -d && docker-compose logs -f middleware; docker-compose stop
scripts.translate: cd docker/environments/translator && docker-compose run translator python3 translator/main.py -i
